original_text: But ye that did cleave unto the Lord your God are alive every one of you this day.
korean_text: 오직 너희의 하나님 여호와께 붙어 떠나지 않은 너희는 오늘까지 다 생존하였느니라

sentences.original_text: But ye that did cleave unto the Lord your God
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 너희가 주 너희 하나님께 붙어 있었으므로

sentences.original_text: are alive every one of you this day
